func sum(x, y){
    var sum=0
    sum = x+y
    return sum
}

city Maribor{
    mBajk mBike1{(547575.6292748451, 46.56272584156842)}
    mBajk mbike2{(547575.6413984299, 46.55847668504357)}

    mBajk mBike7{(547575.6460762024, 46.55757295866902)}

    bikeStand(5) bikeStand1{(547575.6292104721, 46.56103654662082)}
    building building1{box((547575.6095901132, 46.556309560855844), (547575.6098207831, 46.556451579303726))}

    park park1{box((547575.6087934971, 46.555986790273806), (547575.6092816591, 46.55660650809569))}
    road road1{

        line((547575.6098221242, 46.55670518275048), (547575.6100460886, 46.55682414541347), 2)
    }
    bikePath bikePath1{
        var point1=(547575.6098583341, 46.55670241617381)
        var point2=(547575.6101962924, 46.55686656614495)
        var point3=(547575.6112289429, 46.55695140750843)
        var point4=(547575.612924099, 46.556892387443526)
        var point5=(547575.6139969826, 46.556931119368365)
        line(point1, point2, 2)
        line(point2, point3, 2)
        line(point3, point4, 2)
        line(point4, point5, 2)
    }
    river river1{
        var z=call sum(447575.6223225590, 100000.0000000002)
        line((z, 46.56055704283789), (547575.6166362762, 46.56516010422037), 15)
    }
}
